extendedIngredients.name: french bread
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 loaf (1 pound) French bread, cut into 1-inch slices

extendedIngredients.name: sugar free maple syrup
extendedIngredients.originalString: Confectioners' sugar and maple syrup, optional

recipes.title: Macadamia French Toast
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Arrange bread slices in a greased 13-in. x 9-in. baking dish. In a bowl, whisk the eggs, orange juice, milk, sugar, vanilla and nutmeg until blended; pour over bread. Cover and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight.                                                                                           Pour butter into a 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan. Transfer bread slices to prepared pan; sprinkle with nuts. Bake, uncovered, at 400° for 20-25 minutes or until bread is golden brown. Dust with confectioners' sugar and serve with syrup if desired.                                        Yield: 8 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Macadamia French Toast in  Quick CookingMarch/April 2004, p12                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving equals 393 calories, 22 g fat (9 g saturated fat), 138 mg cholesterol, 520 mg sodium, 40 g carbohydrate, 2 g fiber, 9 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Arrange bread slices in a greased 13-in. x 9-in. baking dish. In a bowl, whisk the eggs, orange juice, milk, sugar, vanilla and nutmeg until blended; pour over bread. Cover and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight.
Pour butter into a 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan.
Transfer bread slices to prepared pan; sprinkle with nuts.
Bake, uncovered, at 400° for 20-25 minutes or until bread is golden brown. Dust with confectioners' sugar and serve with syrup if desired.
